ocr_result.full_text:
D Ethereon 10 July 2025
Hey Tushar,
Great news! &
We're super excited to offer you an Al Product Engineer Internship position at ClarityUX! Your
demo blew us away, and we can't wait to see what awesome things youll bring to our team.
The Nitty-Gritty Details
| Product Engineer (sounds fancy, right?)
Product Your Fearless Leader: Amlan Mukerjee, Founder ‘When to Show Up: Starting 14/07/2025 until cancelled by the employer upon mutual
agreement. You will have a 30 days notice period or compensation in lieu of either party.
Please note the probation period spans 6 months from the joining date @
‘When We Code: Monday to Friday, 10am to 7pm (we're flexible, though!)
‘Where the Magic Happens: WeWork Princeville, EGL, Bengaluru (or Remote/Hybrid details if
that's your thing)
The Good Stuff Cha-Ching Rate: %15,000 per month (real money, we promise!) Payday Party: Between the 1st and 10th of each month, straight to your bank
Time Commitment: 40 hours per week
Cool Stuff You'll Be Doing You'll be diving into an Al-powered DesignOps platform that streamlines the design
review process with predictive analysis, boosting quality and saving designers 15-20
hours weekly at least ...$$$
